channel.title: How to Add skill Cape To My Server

item.title: How to Add skill Cape To My Server
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Ffs. Learn what you kids are doing. That quote is editing the level up(attack) case(read it) and when you get 99, you get an attack skill cape. Whether you decide to use team capes or real capes offa silab’s is up to you.

case 0: // Attack levelup sendFrame164(6247); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[0] == 99) { sendMessage("Congratulations on getting Level 99 Attack!"); addItem(10704, 1); addItem(10705, 1); addItem(10706, 1); } //NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
You appearantly do a graphic every level up…and when you get 99 attack, it says so, and you get those 3…capes?
Search case 0: in your client.java, and see those levelups.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Add skill Cape To My Server

item.title: How to Add skill Cape To My Server
item.dc:creator: @Jelly-Fish Jelly-Fish
item.description:
@Jelly-Fish wrote:

I got Right Client And Server But I Dont Know how to Add skill Capes?

So Can U Help Me

Some1 said Me this

add this case 0: // Attack levelup sendFrame164(6247); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[0] == 99) { sendMessage("Congratulations on getting Level 99 Attack!"); addItem(10704, 1); addItem(10705, 1); addItem(10706, 1); } //NpcDialogueSend = true; break; then change the id and att to what u want and start another with case 1

What Are Those Cases? where i Can Find them?

Read full topic
